description: Professor Sycamore`s Gible was brought to the lab by Alan to be healed after it rampaged through the city and got injured. After also rampaging through the lab, Professor Sycamore befriended the Gible and it stayed at the lab with him. While at the lab, it evolved into Professor Sycamore`s Gabite. Little is known about Professor Sycamore`s Gabite other than it resided at the lab and played with the other Pok√©mon in the garden area. One day while in the garden, it evolved into Professor Sycamore`s Garchomp.
name: Gabite (Platane-hakase)
